record.field: Bidding for {{(object.auction_fk.product_name or '')}} will start at {{format_datetime(object.auction_fk.start_date)}}

div.div:
Hey !
Bidding is going to start very soon.

record.field: Bidding for Product will Active Till ??
Bidding for {{(object.auction_fk.product_name or '')}} will active till {{format_datetime(object.auction_fk.email_get_auction_end_date())}}

div.div:
Hey !
Bidding is now active for this auction.

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: Hurry Bidding for {{(object.auction_fk.product_name or '')}} extended till {{format_datetime(object.auction_fk.email_get_auction_end_date())}}

div.div:
Hey !
Bidding duration is extended for few more time.

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: Auction for {{(object.auction_fk.product_name or '')}} has been closed

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: A New Bid Has Been Placed For {{object.auction_fk.product_name}} ! Hurry

nav.div: A new bid has been placed

div.div:
Hey !
A new bid has been Placed .

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: Auction for {{(object.auction_fk.product_name or '')}} has been finish

div.div:
Hey !
I am sorry to tell you,unfortunately ,you have lost an auction.

record.field: Congratulate you have win the auction for {{object.auction_fk.product_name or ''}}

div.div:
Hey !
We Congratulate ,you on being accepted as a Winner of an auction.

record.field: Your auto bid for {{(object.auction_fk.product_name or '')}} auction no longer active

div.div:
Hey !
Your auto bid for auction no longer active,Please raise maximum bid amount.

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: Auto bid for {{(object.auction_fk.product_name or '')}} place on your behalf

div.div:
Hey !
An auto bid has been placed on your behalf.

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.
